# MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle.abbreviated

**Case**

Abbreviates units.

## Declaration

```swift
case abbreviated
```

## Discussion

For example, if the units are metric the map displays “km” instead of “kilometer.”

## Constants

- **MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle.default**: Bases the determination to abbreviate on the current locale and user language settings.
- **MKDistanceFormatter.DistanceUnitStyle.full**: Spells out units in full.
